Abatarana karuna amadera paksa theke santi o kalyanasaha ebam apanara prati ye saba sampradaya apanara sathe rayeche tadera prati; ara kichu sampradaya rayeche amara taderake jibana upabhoga karate deba, pare amadera paksa theke yantranadayaka sasti taderake sparsa karabe
